messages.subject: reading and vision therapy
messages.msgSnippet: I have alwasy been an avid reader and when I was in middle school I started having a terrible time with reading.   By highschool I would get really tired or
messages.messageBody:
I have alwasy been an avid reader and when I was in middle school I started
having a terrible time with reading. By highschool I would get really tired
or terrible headaches from reading. My mother took me to a handful of doctors
before a optometrist (please correct my spelling) that had the same problem
helped me. I can't remember what it is called, but I have perfect vision, but
when I read my eyes have a problem with focus. I just broke my glasses that
I've had for 13 years and I have to get new ones and have no idea what my
prescription should be. But, I had invisible bifocals with just enough of
difference to fix the problem. It was amazing how well they worked. I'm having
problems since my glasses broke =)

Heather


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
